title: 4C-ID Based Intensive Mobile Programming Course for Non-Majors [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computing concepts and simple algorithm principles
context.additional_context: Strengthening foundational programming competencies for graduate students in non-computer majors (e.g., architecture)

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more practical Python-based examples within one week.
Learners can self-diagnose code errors with over 80% accuracy using debugging tools.
Learners can design simple applications utilizing conditional statements, loops, and function concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
